name: Stick-Man City Fight-ing Army Shoot-er
description: Blast your way through the city crime war zone. Army doodle stickman epic war empire fighting. Use your stickman sniper shooting aim and stickman battlefield game survival skills. We all love the classic army war games and army battle games fighting and strategy based alike. In this stickman army game you must use you war machine army of heroes to defeat the broken streets. Simple 2d army infantry game. If u like stickman games such as stickman killing games, stickman revenge games, or army men with commando defense battle skills you might like this game. Have fun!
